Class AbstractStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.escape.game.scenario.AbstractStage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stage
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Earth, Jupiter, Moon

    public abstract class AbstractStage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Stage
    This class provide a skeletal implementation of any Ship in the game.
